tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE data_access_log (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  access_type VARCHAR(255),
  data_table VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
CREATE TABLE data_access_logs (id INT, user_id INT, action VARCHAR(50), timestamp TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE privacy_logs (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  data_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Data_Access_Log (
    ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    User_ID INT,
    Accessed_Table VARCHAR(50),
    Access_Type VARCHAR(50),
    Access_Timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Data_Modification_Log (
    ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    User_ID INT,
    Modified_Table VARCHAR(50),
    Modification_Type VARCHAR(50),
    Modification_Timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Data_Privacy_Tracking (
    ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    User_ID INT,
    Accessed_Table VARCHAR(50),
    Access_Type VARCHAR(50),
    Access_Timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE User_Permissions (
    ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Role_ID INT,
    Table_Name VARCHAR(50),
    Read_Permission BOOLEAN, 
    Write_Permission BOOLEAN
);
